com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.geo.tracker

Class AWSLocationTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.geo.tracker.AWSLocationTracker

  • public class AWSLocationTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    Monitor your device's location and periodically send the tracked coordinates to the Amazon Location Service.

        Parameters:

        credentialsProvider - Your auth provider - most likely AWSMobileClient.getInstance()

    • Method Detail

      • startTracking

        public void startTracking(android.content.Context context)
        Start monitoring your device's location and sending the tracked coordinates to Amazon Location Service.
        Parameters:
        context - Context for the application you are calling this from

      • startTracking

        public void startTracking(android.content.Context context,
                          TrackingListener listener)
        Start monitoring your device's location and sending the tracked coordinates to Amazon Location Service.
        Parameters:
        context - Context for the application you are calling this from
        listener - Contains the various callback methods to listen to the different events which will be emitted.

      • startTracking

        public void startTracking(android.content.Context context,
                          TrackingOptions options,
                          TrackingListener listener)
        Start monitoring your device's location and sending the tracked coordinates to Amazon Location Service.
        Parameters:
        context - Context for the application you are calling this from
        options - Configure details of how tracking will work.
        listener - Contains the various callback methods to listen to the different events which will be emitted.

      • stopTracking

        public void stopTracking(android.content.Context context)
        Stop recording and sending the device's location. You can start tracking again with new options if you want.

      • isTracking

        public boolean isTracking()
        Returns true if this tracker instance is currently monitoring and sending the device's location. False otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if this tracker instance is currently monitoring and sending the device's location. False otherwise.
